posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a 1907 Bangor Baseball team photo with Louis Sockalexis.
Very rare card. I figure I will toss it out here before sending it off to ebay.

Graded SGC 30, which is the highest graded one by SGC (Population 2; I own them both).

I love this card, but I recently picked up one I like better, and the home accounting office said no on keeping them both. :D

I am looking for CARD NO LONGER AVAILABLE net to me. I will pay for shipping with tracking. PM over post, and I will take it trumps negotiations.

I suppose if someone wanted my other one, I could be talked into it, and keep this one, but it would take some convincing (see the Sockalexis thread for pics of that one).

As usual, please note that I work during the week, so I can't ship until Saturday.

Thanks,
Sean

This message approved by the home accounting office. :(

Last call at $1300 before it goes off to the auction...which will probably be sometime during the week.

Thanks,
Sean

Card is no longer available.

Thanks,
Sean
